properties.entry: SELECT ddi.id, ddi.code, ddi.value, dd.name AS typeName, dd.code AS dictionaryCode, (CASE IFNULL(dd.`isDeleted`, 0) WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE IFNULL(ddi.`isDeleted`,0) END) AS 'isDeleted', ddi.useIn FROM dim_dictionary dd, dim_dictionary_items ddi WHERE dd.id = ddi.dictionaryId {? AND dd.code in (#DictionaryCodes#)} ORDER BY ddi.sortNo

SELECT ddi.id, ddi.code, ddi.value, dd.name AS typeName, (CASE IFNULL(dd.`isDeleted`, 0) WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE IFNULL(ddi.`isDeleted`, 0) END) AS 'isDeleted', ddi.useIn FROM dim_dictionary dd, dim_dictionary_items ddi WHERE dd.id = ddi.dictionaryId AND dd.code = #code# ORDER BY ddi.sortNo
